title: What to Expect When He’s Expecting Oral
itunes:title: What to Expect When He’s Expecting Oral

description:
On today’s show, Emily is talking about the stages all relationships go through as well as how to navigate them – including in the bedroom.

She discusses the 5 stages of a relationship & how to work through them all. Plus, what to do when you like giving oral, but it’s becoming too much of an expectation, how to talk to your kids about puberty without it being painful or embarrassing for either of you, and having shower sex that actually feels good.

Thank you for supporting our sponsors who help keep the show FREE: PlusOne, Woo More Play, Fleshlight, SiriusXM

Follow Emily on all social: @sexwithemily

For even more sex advice, tips & tricks, visit: sexwithemily.com


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
